name: Juncheng Wang 0001
content: Juncheng Wang/Home top of pageAssistant Professor Department of Computer Science Hong Kong Baptist University Kowloon Tong, Hong KongOffice: Room 633, David C. Lam Building Email: jcwang@comp.hkbu.edu.hk Phone: +852 5226 7502CV I received my Ph.D. degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Toronto in 2023, working with Prof. Ben Liang (IEEE Fellow) and Prof. Min Dong (IEEE Fellow). I received my M.Sc. degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Alberta in 2017, and my B.Eng. degree in Electrical Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2014. ​ My research interests are in networked systems and mobile communications, especially network artificial intelligence, online learning, distributed computing, stochastic optimization, and their applications to integrated computation and communication systems. ​ Prospective Students: I am always looking for Ph.D. students (multiple openings for 2026), Research Assistants, Post-docs, and Visitors to work with me (see this document for more details). If you find there are some common research interests between us, please feel free to drop me an email with your CV and any other supporting materials.bottom of page
